cont.entity_a: Stopped working in less than a year. Problematic in low light. Slow but acceptable for the price.
cont.entity_b: Fast and accurate. Generally fast but can be slow in low light.

cont.entity_a: Tamron is not an authorized seller in Canada, affecting warranty eligibility. Tamron warranty repair service is efficient but shipping is at the user's expense. Warranty process is cumbersome. Includes a lens hood and a 6-year warranty.
Telephoto macro function is appreciated. Macro feature works well. Macro and zoom combination is well-received.
cont.entity_b: Great for portrait and macro work.

cont.entity_a: Solid and well-built, providing good picture quality. Lightweight and less expensive.
cont.entity_b: Heavy compared to other lenses. Solid construction with fast, quiet autofocus.

cont.entity_a: The lens is noisy and slow, especially unsuitable for astrophotography due to lens creep.
Great value for a 70-300mm range. Affordable alternative to Canon lenses. Great for the price.
cont.entity_b: Highly recommended for its price point. Great prime lens for the budget.
No image stabilization but f/1.8 aperture compensates.

cont.entity_a: Focus is slow and the lens body contains plastic parts prone to breaking. Focus is slow and noisy, with noticeable chromatic aberration.
cont.entity_b: Focus is fast and images are sharp.

cont.entity_a: Picture quality is clear and impressive for the price. Good clarity for action shots. Sharp when stopped down to f/8. Soft images in dim or dark conditions. Image quality softens at extreme zoom.
cont.entity_b: Sharpness is better than some more expensive lenses. Produces clear, crisp photos. Chromatic aberration can occur but is minor.

cont.entity_a: Not suitable for fast-moving sports photography. Good for outdoor photography in good lighting. Great for low-light video surveillance work. Great for portraits and nature photography.
cont.entity_b: Suitable for portraits and action shots. Great for low light and indoor sports photography.
Great bokeh quality. Produces beautiful bokeh. Sharp images with creamy bokeh.

cont.entity_a: After 7 months, the lens showed an error due to supposedly dirty contacts, though they were clean.
The lens is lightweight for its size.
